ing: 1 ripe avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced
des: "This is something I made up on the fly one day for breakfast to try and use up an overly ripe avocado. Freeze for 1 hour for a more ice cream-like treat."
ins:
Mash avocado in a bowl. Add heavy cream, stevia, vanilla, and cinnamon; mix thoroughly.
Refrigerate avocado mixture for 1 hour before serving.
